com.example.cshare.ui.views.auth

Class ProfileFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
      • com.example.cshare.ui.views.BaseFragment
        • com.example.cshare.ui.views.auth.ProfileFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnClickListener, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner, com.mobsandgeeks.saripaar.Validator.ValidationListener

    public class ProfileFragment
extends BaseFragment
implements android.view.View.OnClickListener, com.mobsandgeeks.saripaar.Validator.ValidationListener
    Fragment which inherits from the BaseFragment class and manages all user information.

    Implements a profileViewModel to be able to retrieve information from the user but also to edit it. On the other hand, the authViewModel allows to manage several authentication features proposed in this fragment such as password change, account deletion or log out.

    Since:
    1.1
    Author:
    Clara Gros, Babacar Toure
    See Also:
    BaseFragment, ProfileViewModel, AuthViewModel, User

      • logOut

        private void logOut()
        Creates and shows an alertDialog to confirm or not logout.

        In case of confirmation, calls the log out method of the authViewModel

        See Also:
        AlertDialog, AuthViewModel.logOut()

      • changePassword

        private void changePassword()
        Creates and shows an alertDialog to change password.

        In case of confirmation, creates a changePassword form if the form is valid and calls the change password method of the authViewModel

        See Also:
        AlertDialog, User, AuthViewModel.changePassword(User)

      • deleteAccount

        private void deleteAccount()
        Creates and shows an alertDialog to delete account.

        In case of confirmation, calls the delete account method of the authViewModel

        See Also:
        AlertDialog, AuthViewModel.deleteAccount()

      • saveEdit

        private void saveEdit()
        Validate the fields and calls the editProfile method of the profileViewModel.

        Once the fields are validated, creates an editProfileForm. Check whether the profile picture has been changed. If yes, add it to the editProfileForm and eventually edit the profile. Moreover, if the campus has also been edited, calls the onCampusChanged method of the HomeScreenActivity to update the product lists.

        See Also:
        AlertDialog, ProfileViewModel.editProfile(User), HomeScreenActivity.onCampusChanged()

      • getChangePasswordResponse

        private void getChangePasswordResponse()
        Observe the change password response from the authViewModel.

        After a request to change password, the response status changes to success or failure. In case of failure, toasts an error message. After having done so, Set the status of the response to Complete to indicate the event has been handled.

        See Also:
        AuthViewModel.getChangePasswordMutableLiveData(), EmptyAuthResponse

      • getLogoutResponse

        private void getLogoutResponse()
        Observe the log out response from the authViewModel.

        After a request to log out, the response status changes to success or failure. In case of success, calls the updateUserCredentials method of the authViewModel and redirects to the LoginActivity. In case of failure, toasts an error message. After having done so, Set the status of the response to Complete to indicate the event has been handled.

        See Also:
        AuthViewModel.getLogoutResponseMutableLiveData(), EmptyAuthResponse, AuthViewModel.updateUserCredentials()

      • getDeleteAccountResponse

        private void getDeleteAccountResponse()
        Observe the delete account response from the authViewModel.

        After a request to delete ones account, the response status changes to success or failure. In case of success, calls the updateUserCredentials method of the authViewModel and redirects to the LoginActivity. In case of failure, toasts an error message. After having done so, Set the status of the response to Complete to indicate the event has been handled.

        See Also:
        (), EmptyAuthResponse, AuthViewModel.updateUserCredentials()

      • getUserDetails

        private void getUserDetails()
        Observe the user details from the profileViewModel.

        After a request to retrieve the user details, the response status changes to success or failure. In case of a successful response, calls the updateUserDetails to update data that has changed. In case of failure, toasts an error message.

        See Also:
        ProfileViewModel.getUserProfileMutableLiveData(), UserReponse, updateUserDetails(User)

      • updateUserDetails

        private void updateUserDetails(User profile)
        Update the views according to the profile (User) parameter
        Parameters:
        profile - (User)
        See Also:
        User

      • showPictureDialog

        private void showPictureDialog(androidx.fragment.app.Fragment fragment)
        Builds and shows an AlertDialog to select the method from the MediaFiles class to apply : either choosePictureFromGallery or captureImage
        Parameters:
        fragment - (Fragment) the current Fragment
        See Also:
        AlertDialog, MediaFiles.captureImage(Activity, Fragment), MediaFiles.choosePictureFromGallery(Activity, Fragment)

                             android.content.Intent data)
        Receiving activity result method will be called after closing the gallery or the camera. Modify the raw picture, store it in a new file and retrieve its Uri

      • configureCampusSpinner

        private void configureCampusSpinner()
        Configure the spinner that contains every campus.

        Creates an ArrayAdapter using a defined campus string array and a default spinner layout and enables to retrieve the item when selected

        See Also:
        Spinner, ArrayAdapter, Spinner.setOnItemClickListener(AdapterView.OnItemClickListener)
